question.content: Did you guys take any inspiration from My Time In Portia? I felt like they did a lot of things right (automation of gathering, combat that's not super difficult but rewarding if you do it, general progression feeling, etc) Will there be any automation of gathering at a later point in the game?

answer.content: Overwhelming majority of us are at S6 because we love these exact games and we played them all. Inspiration is probably the wrong word, since game developers often tend to see all games at least somewhat critically. Influenced, maybe - as in, we tend to have long discussions about how different games approach the same feature, and what we feel works and what we feel does not. Portia certainly has a lot of great ideas, but there is no single title where we would go "let's do our X exactly like game ABC"
